full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG BSGRUB KYI CHOS SKOR LAS, 'CHI KA MA'I SEMS CAN LA PHAN THABS BYA TSUL NYAMS THAG DBUGS 'BYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024B (CES 'CHI KA MA'I SEMS CAN LA PHAN THABS BYA TSUL NYAMS THAG DBUGS 'BYIN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DENG DUS SNYIGS MAR GYUR BA'I DBANG GIS PHAL BA RNAMS LTA CI 'GREL MANG @025A PO'I 'DREN POR RLOM PA 'GA' ZHIG KYANG 'CHI KA'I SEMS CAN GYIS SNGAS MGOR SLEBS PA NA, BYIN RTEN MYANG DU 'JUG PA LAS PHAN PA'I THABS GZHAN MDZAD MI MKHYEN PA MANG PO MTHONG BAS RKYEN BYAS, ,MCHOG DMAN THAMS CAN KYIS LAG TU BLANG BDE BA 'DI 'DRA ZHIG BRIS NA 'GA' ZHIG LA PHAN PAR 'GYUR BA SRID SNYAM NAS, ,KU S'A LI DHARMA BADZRA GYIS MO TOG LTU MA RA'I BSTI GNAS SU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BIKshU WA GINDRA SHA SA NA WA RTAS BGYIS PA'O,, ` AOm SVA STI, NYAMS THAG MA RGAN 'CHI KHA'I SEMS CAN GYI, ,DBUGS 'BYIN 'JIGS MED BDER BKOD GDAMS PA MCHOG ,'DI BSGRUB DGE BAS BDAG GZHAN 'GRO BA KUN, ,SGRIB BYANG TSOGS RDZOGS KUN MKHYEN MYUR THOB SHOG ,)
